thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 6 of 522
thread.title: JOHN HUBER

author: JOHN HUBER
title: JOHN HUBER
text: My online order sat for five days with no communication. I had to check status online to discover they (due to their internal policies) weren't going to honor my prescription and the order was dead. Again, no communication. Wouldn't have been as big of a deal if this had been an order for say dog treats. Phone reps only response was "we sent you an email." Sorry, not good enough and no email came in. Lens Discounters and 1800Contacts are competent, try them!
